marklogic.body: Glenn's face was not only puffy, but so were his fingers. Although I know that Glenn has great health insurance and sees a physician regularly, I would suggest that if he has not done so, he should have his thyroid checked along with his iodine levels. Iodine should rid his body of some toxins which can become trapped in the cells of the body. A change in the shape and size of his fingers may also indicate some type of heart problem. So Glenn, if you are reading this, do your fans a favor, go to an endocrinologist at a research hospital and get yourself checked out. There is a difference in being "puffy" from weight Gain and being "puffy" from some unknown toxin in your system. Make sure your body is free of halides and rich in iodine. No I am not a physician, but I have the same problem with the "puffiness". Hugs from all your fans, Nan
